attributes.action: prevent the closure of Harrow Ceramics Department
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come as a complete shock to myself and the Ceramics Course Team, that after we have created a beautiful, brilliantly equipped new ceramics department last year after the devastating fire of June 2007, my Management has prepared a case for the closure of Ceramics. This would be carried out in a phased manner, closing in 2013 ( our 50th Anniversary on this site ) with part time students who started the course in 2007. I have not been allowed to revalidate the course as planned this year, and am told that intake for 2009 will be suspended. (Note from editor: JUST HEARD - 26.11.08 THERE WILL BE CONSULTATION!!*)
We will of course fight this decision, however it is with the greatest of regret that I have to let you know that there is a real crisis at Harrow. The staff are now of the opinion that we desperately need a response from the wider ceramics/arts/education community to help us in our plight. Please show your support by signing this petition. Kyra Cane

rejection.details: Your titlend petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
